data.actual_result: The server icon displays the characters over the background, and even over the preview circle
data.expected_result: The server icon preview displays as normal
data.short_description: Server placeholder icon is displayed incorrectly when typing certain symbols
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a new server without putting an icon, generating a placeholder text one - Go to Server Settings - Change the name to have random strings of the following characters: ( ) & \* # $ @ !
